  2. WHAMM! Real-time world modelling of interactive environments.  Microsoft
  3. I strongly feel this AI-powered demo of Quake 2 is an insult to life itself  Rock Paper Shotgun
  4. Microsoft Releases Generative AI Version of '90s Classic Quake II  PCMag
  5. ‘Quake II’ Review (Microsoft AI Co-Pilot Edition): A Modern Tragedy  Forbes

item.title: Microsoft is offering free AI skills training for everyone - how to sign up - ZDNET
item.description:
1. Microsoft is offering free AI skills training for everyone - how to sign up  ZDNET
  2. Microsoft is offering free AI skills training: Here’s how to sign-up  The Indian Express
  3. Microsoft’s AI Skills Fest wants your help in setting a Guinness World Record tomorrow  htxt.co.za
  4. Microsoft Marks 50th Anniversary with Invite to Students to Join AI Skills Fest  techbuzzireland.com
  5. During Microsoft’s AI Skills Fest, You Can Attempt to Set a Guinness World Records Title  eWEEK
